did.unittitle: Gerald Goodrich "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York" Manuscript
did.abstract: "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York" by Gerald Goodrich, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York," by Gerald Goodrich. The study examines three cases: Syracuse Building Trades Strike, 1913; Rome General Strike, 1919; and Syracuse Remington Rand Strike, 1936.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
